p.span: We at Warren School District #205, believe that education is a collaborative effort of home, school, and community; and that all students have the capability to learn. We believe in stimulating the students to become lifelong learners, while enhancing their life skills through the best practices of the educational setting. Students will achieve a foundation to become productive, self-reliant citizens in today’s world.

li.class: rpwe-li rpwe-clearfix
li.div: Good Afternoon, Warriors: It is with a heavy heart that I inform all of you that Governor Pritzker has announced the suspension of in-person instruction through the remainder of the school year. This extends our remote learning plan through the end of the academic school year. Frankly, this is a …Read More »

li.class: rpwe-li rpwe-clearfix

img.alt: A Little Something to Kick Off Your Spring Break
A Little Something to Kick Off Your Spring Break

a.title: Permalink to A Little Something to Kick Off Your Spring Break

h3.a: A Little Something to Kick Off Your Spring Break

li.div: Hello, I hope all of you are having a good day, but I know it is about to get much better! There is a a video below that is going to brighten your day. I would like to say thank you to the best director in the business Jason Bennett, …Read More »

li.div: Hope this puts a smile on your face like it does for us each day! We are so proud of our Warren Kindergarten kids! We miss and love you all so much!!!Read More »

div.p: We at Warren School District #205, believe that education is a collaborative effort of home, school, and community; and that all students have the capability to learn. We believe in stimulating the students to become lifelong learners, while enhancing their life skills through the best practices of the educational setting. Students will achieve a foundation to become productive, self-reliant citizens in today’s world.
